answerText: animal liberation [anything mentioning both parts is pretty much fine, but do not prompt on answers such as "animal rights" because they don't title the book][10] Author Isaac Singer is best known for this short story about a man who refuses to believe in the adultery of his wife until she reveals that their six children are not his on her deathbed.

subject: Trash
question: Question: In the spirit of a good old-fashioned NAQT miscellaneous bonus, name some things related to accomplishments of people with the last name Singer, for 10 points each:  [10] Australian philosopher Peter Singer is best known for his contributions to this philosophical movement that titles a 1975 book that he wrote.  It is also associated with the work of Richard Ryder and Tom Regan.
